Detailed Description

template<class T, class Tween = TweenFirst<T>, class Vec = std::vector<T>>
class AnnalSynchronised< T, Tween, Vec >

This template class defines an annal that is synchronised to the input frame clock.

i.e. there is one event for every input frame. A class providing a function to interpolate between two event structures can be provided in the second template argument. [Considered but rejected was calling on a member of T]
